briefTitle: An Evaluation of a Self-contained Direct Digital Radiography System for Breast Specimen Imaging
officialTitle: An Evaluation of a Self-contained Direct Digital Radiography System for Breast Specimen Imaging
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Breast biopsy specimen will be imaged on standard of care device and on the Trident Specimen Radiography device to compare quality of images.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast specimens acquired through MIBB or Surgical techniques arriving for specimen imaging

Exclusion Criteria:

* Breast specimens that are larger than12 x 14 cm.
